title: Page 6D of the Sunday June 23, 2013 paper had a photograph purporting to be of a Confederate Artillery Captain standing next to a Parrott Rifle. He is wearing \'shoulder boards\'. I thought those were only worn by Union forces and Confederates wore Commissioned insignia on their collars. Please enlighten me of any variations.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=19052
